      • getEngine

        public ISMREngine getEngine(UUID streamID,
                            Class<?> objClass)
        Returns an SMR engine for a transactional context.
        Specified by:
        getEngine in interface ITransaction
        Parameters:
        streamID - The streamID the SMR engine should run on.
        objClass - The class that the SMR engine runs against.
        Returns:
        The SMR engine to be used for a transactional context.

      • registerStream

        public void registerStream(UUID stream)
        Registers a stream to be part of a transactional context.
        Specified by:
        registerStream in interface ITransaction
        Parameters:
        stream - A stream that will be joined into this transaction.

      • setInstance

        public void setInstance(ICorfuDBInstance instance)
        Set the CorfuDB instance for this transaction. Used during deserialization.
        Specified by:
        setInstance in interface ITransaction
        Parameters:
        instance - The CorfuDB instance used for this tx.

      • getInstance

        public ICorfuDBInstance getInstance()
        return a pointer to the runtime managing this transaction. this is needed for transactions on objects which may create new objects during that transaction.
        Specified by:
        getInstance in interface ITransaction
        Returns:
        the runtime

        Specified by:

      • getTransaction

        Returns:

      • propose

        public ITimestamp propose()
                   throws IOException
        Propose to the SMR engine(s) for the transaction to be executed.
        Specified by:
        propose in interface ITransaction
        Returns:
        The timestamp that the transaction was proposed at. This timestamp should be a valid timestamp for all streams that the transaction belongs to, otherwise, the transaction will abort.
        Throws:
        IOException
